title: Test
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing Luxury segment, and All retail.
The line for Luxury segment has the highest values across Year with a mean value of 24.4,
and it peaked at 2013-2018 with a value of 24.8.
All retail mostly had the least y-axis name with a mean value of 9.5,
which peaked at 2013-2018 with a value of 11.9.
Overall All retail is gradually increasing, Luxury segment is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The difference of y_axis name between Luxury segment and All retail is smaller at Year 2013-2018 compared to the Year 2008-2013.
The greatest difference of y_axis name between Luxury segment and All retail occurs at Year 2008-2013 and the smallest difference occurs at 2013-2018.
